News.Title: Sonu Infratech Secures 141 Crore Rupee Order
News.Summary: Sonu Infratech, a company with a market capitalization of 140 crore rupees, has won a significant order worth 141 crore rupees. This order represents a major business development for the SME (Small and Medium Enterprise) company, potentially boosting its revenue and market position.

News.Title: Sonu Infratech Secures Order Worth 568.2 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Sonu Infratech, a company with a market capitalization of 96 crore rupees, has received an order valued at 568.2 million rupees. This order represents a significant business opportunity for the small and medium enterprise (SME).
